ygData.subject: Re: Meditation change?
ygData.msgSnippet: i ve had that happen before when i was in cazic....feerrott was down, i tried to zone, and my keys locked too...had to reboot as well.....sounds like a bug we
ygData.messageBody:
i've had that happen before when i was in cazic....feerrott was down, i tried to
zone, and my keys locked too...had to reboot as well.....sounds like a bug we
should report....o btw, on the cleric quests, there is a good one in qeynos for
the shining star of light....got it tonight...nice weapon.....just wish i knew
if clense was random like the yaulp on the screaming mace or something like
that....tried right clicking and nothing, so it might be broke at the
time.....anyone know if that's the case or if it's random? still need me a good
shield to use with it tho.....

(\/)ystix Spellchaser
lv 44 human cleric of The Rathe

Walt Zimbeck wrote:

> From: "Walt Zimbeck" <wzimbeck@...>
>
> I was wondering what the proper procedure was to petition for a change. I
> do not know about the rest of you but I feel that clerics should get
> meditate at six and not have to wait until eight for it. My seventh level
> cleric spends a lot of time just sitting waiting for mana for restore. It
> is really glaring when you are grouped with spell casters and after the
> battle you heal them up and then have to sit for five or ten minutes to get
> your mana back when they are ready to go again in just two or three minutes.
>
> Let me know your feelings on this and I will try to get it started if there
> is enough support and if not then I will just live with it the way it is.
>
> On a side note a very strange thing happened to me this morning. I was
> hunting in Butcherblock and ran out of food. Rather than making the long
> run back to Felwithe for more food I decided to gate. I got a message
> about that zone being down and that they would put me in a safe place within
> my zone. The safe place ended up just outside the dwarf city and I was
> near the GF zone point, but that is not the problem. Everything except
> keyboard locked up tight. I could not use my mouse to do anything at all.
> No casting, no sitting, no selling or buying and worst of all no camping to
> escape that mess and of course no GM's or Guides around. I could not even
> do a soft boot to escape and ended up doing a hard re-boot. I suppose
> that maybe I could have tried to get back to the GF zone point and try to
> zone out to see if that cleared it up but my defensive spells were about to
> wear off and I could not refresh them.
>
> Thanks all for listening to my rantings,
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
